EmailTemplate.description: Rate Behr & Kilz Products for a Chance to Win $250 THD Gift Card
EmailTemplate.name: Pro Rate & Win Q3
EmailTemplate.subject: Rate Behr & Kilz Products for a Chance to Win $250 Home Depot Gift Card
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
I just wanted to let you know we have a sweepstakes going on right now for our customers who use BEHR® and KILZ® products. Share your product feedback by submitting a review between July 17 and Aug 14 and you can enter for a chance to win a $250 Home Depot® gift card.
Visit http://www.behr.com/pro/ratings-and-reviews to enter.
Contact me if you need more information on our Primers and Paints, or have any questions.
See you on the Job Site!
Respectfully,
Respectfully, {!Account.OwnerFullName} Professional Sales & Services {!Account.OwnerPhone} {!Account.OwnerEmail} http://www.behrpro.com
To enter, you must be at least 21 years of age, have read and agree to the official sweepstakes rules and wish to participate. Rules can be viewed at http://www.behr.com/pro/sweepstakes-official-rules.
